website_summaries.verdict: All-cotton hammock is breathable and lightweight, making it ideal for porches, yards, and poolside use.
pros: Superior quality construction with tightly-woven cotton
Comes with all essential hardware and installation is a breeze
cons: Some customers report that not all hammocks are made in Brazil as advertised

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday so not sure of long term durability but it feels sturdy. Absolutely beautiful and we think it's very comfortable. We only had 9 feet between the trees from which we hung it so we had to knot the ropes in one end to shorten the whole thing a bit. But it worked out great. Daughter loves reading in it. Husband will definitely nap in it.
customer_reviews.author: David T

customer_reviews.title: Tore on first use
customer_reviews.text: Tore right down the middle on our first use. Unless you like a surprise crash into the concrete deck below, do not buy this hammock! And no, we do not exceed the weight limit...not even close. :/
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Faded in Sun
customer_reviews.text: This faded so quickly in the Florida Sun. Wish they made the colors to stay longer, quality is very inferior. I cant believe it faded so fast, looks very work out in few months.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate, just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this hammock. We bought it with the stand last year and used it daily through the summer. Held up great! We made the poor decision to leave it outside in the weather over the fall and winter and it faded terribly. Bought this one to freshen it up and replace our mistake. Highly recommend this hammock!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquiejones10

customer_reviews.title: Relaxation!
customer_reviews.text: Live here at the lake and have LOTS of trees. It is great to be hooked up between two trees, in the back with the patio, trees, etc., and just lay back to chill and read. It's relaxing and great for myself but also when people are over. Everyone loves it, along with all the other trees, fireplace, etc. in the back yard. Very sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Broncos#1Fan

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfy. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I like this hammock a lot. It’s really deep and well made. Nice canvas. In order to get comfy, you kind of need to dangle a leg off the side or it envelopes you a little too much. Once you get the right position, it’s very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Needs a Hammock
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I could’ve made before quarantine. We love it! So far, I have taken it in though before it rains, so I don’t know how it would hold up if it got wet. The colors are great- remind us of a tropical island.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company.
customer_reviews.text: Best hammock and company!!!! I’ve been so happy with this company I have the freestanding set up and it was easy to put together and I use it almost everyday. This is my second summer and it’s still in great shape. Buy this product you will be very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful product! It is very well made and sturdy. You will need to purchase some rope, though, to attach it to the grommets on either end. These grommets are lined with metal, which makes it even sturdier. For the price, it is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Scull

customer_reviews.title: Holy crap it is a great hammock
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap it is a great hammock! I use it in Afghanistan when we are on patrol instead of sleeping on the ground and it works great. Is pretty light and doesn't feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jmc1131

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable fabric and the right width to cocoon yourself if you want but not be swallowed in it if you don’t want.
customer_reviews.author: Emulsified

customer_reviews.title: Good enough, but has some minor issues.
customer_reviews.text: I believe the box and description both said hand woven. It doesn't look hand woven to me. It is a good heavy canvas type material, and should hold up to regular use, but hardly hand woven. Also, there is a metal bracket that is supposed to protect the cotton loops from wearing through that pops out and must constantly be put back in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, super comfortable! Seems very sturdy. Colors are exactly how they look online. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Received it today. Good thick material. Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.author: TRICIA SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and sturdy. Wish fabric was a bit thicker. Great hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Jellybean

customer_reviews.title: Better than the old one. Much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Our old hammock finally wore out after 5 seasons of use. We like this one because it is easier to get into and it envelopes you like you're in a cocoon. We had put it away for the winter, but winter was only here for a brief while. So, we have it hanging out in the trees and use it most every afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: BeachWizard

customer_reviews.title: different color) we decided on this color and it is perfect. The straps are a little shorter than on ...
customer_reviews.text: After our prior hammock broke (same brand, different color) we decided on this color and it is perfect. The straps are a little shorter than on the prior one but the stand we have is adjustable so it still fits. Very vivid colors, just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Pet owner with 3 kids

customer_reviews.title: Vivere BRAZ118 Brazilian Style Single Hammock
customer_reviews.text: The Hammock arrived on time, and it has held up so far, very confy. In my opinion it is perfect when you lay across sort of diagonally. Maybe that's just me being weird, but the hammock is very non-judgemental as well, so it works out for me.
customer_reviews.author: zam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it...Hung them in their bedrooms and they prefer them over their beds
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have two of them now, and a large hammock. We enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect deck hammock
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very comfortable and doesn't sag like the camping hammocks.
customer_reviews.author: pfunk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and comfortable. you will definitely nap in this thing!
customer_reviews.author: DV White

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is amazing! I have a screened porch and wanted to have a hammock for a long time. I was not sure what to expect but this is the greatest thing ever, I am not sure that I will use my bed again (just kidding). The quality is amazing and the comfort is outstanding
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hammock
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful hammock. It is very comfortable and easy to use. I would recommend this hammock for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this quality hammock!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Hammock is great for a lazy, breezy afternoon. Will definitely buy another one in case my family wears it out too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sharona

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Given for a Christmas present, it's winter, so I'll get feedback in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M. Quigley

customer_reviews.title: and I am happy about it
customer_reviews.text: Well, the hammock is a spare that I will use in about a year or so, it is still in the package until I need it. But it did arrive, and I am happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Benko

customer_reviews.title: Bought for 3.5 year old daughters
customer_reviews.text: Daughters love these hammocks and they are perfect size for them. One vacillates between bed and hammock, but other one will only sleep in hammock for naps and nighttime. I hung them 10 inches off ground so easy to get in and out and water is always close by.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: too small for my frame but I went to Lowes and bought chain link and rigged it. Fades easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really think I would love it if I could just get my WIFE out of it! Enough said
customer_reviews.author: custer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Color has started to fade pretty significantly and we have only had it about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: OT Girl13

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I bought this and the tree straps. Had it set up in no time and I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Licker

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Hammock, I bought it for my cabin in No. Minnesota. It's very comfortable and I spend many afternoons relaxing and reading a book in my hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Murk

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These hammocks last forever and are so much more comfortable than rope hammocks. We leave it in the back yard through all the rains of summer and it retains its shape and strength.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rope was very long for my stand but two knots worked well
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: I was not pleased with the hammock
customer_reviews.text: I was not pleased with the hammock. It did not fit the hammock stand (made by the same company) and it didn't feel too comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Toba

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this hammock except that you couldn't leave it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine S.

customer_reviews.title: A great and comfy hammock
customer_reviews.text: I have had this in my yard under two giant oak trees for a few months now. It is taking just about all the abuse it could face: wind, rain, sun, humidity, and yet it feels fresh everytime I sit on it. No mildew buildup at all like a few other models I had bought and tucked away in the basemanet. Great color too that highlight my yard very well. Strongly suggest this item!
customer_reviews.author: Jacques

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: works great. comfortable. i'm 6ft 3in tall, and i made the mistake of not ordering a larger one, BUT, it will works fine. used it camping recently. perfect for an afternoon nap.
customer_reviews.author: dakota_veer

customer_reviews.title: I like the fabric and style of the hammock
customer_reviews.text: I like the fabric and style of the hammock. However, it is not 132 inches long. It is only 115 inches long. Now, I'm out the shipping charges both for delivery and the return. I'm very disappointed that the description was false!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hammock. Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hammock. Great price and quality. Just got it today though so we will see how it holds up. So far impressed with the comfort, quality, and overall look.
customer_reviews.author: BLACKOPS MASTER81

customer_reviews.title: YOU SHOULD BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Greatest hammock ever got! Perfect hammock for anything, its very big but it also fits in my tiny room!!! lol
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hu

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was not please with the quality of this hammock. The fabric was not soft or comfortable at all. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: MDShopper

customer_reviews.title: best by far
customer_reviews.text: I have had numerous hammocks that don't seem to last for a season....this is THE best hammock by far!! Colors are vivid and very solid made....
customer_reviews.author: Rita Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. We're taking it inside when we're not using it to help prevent colors from fading in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Clausen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice  Single Person Hammock
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed Cotton 1 person hammock. It is very comfortable when laid in diagonally. Since I don't orienteer anymore I'd rather have this hammock, a nice line supported bug enclosure & a decent tarp for my forays into the woods. For me Cotton beats Nylon when its warm.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

product_meta.title: Vivere Brazilian Style Single Hammock, Desert Moon (BRAZ125)
product_meta.description: Color:Desert MoonBrazilian hammocks offer the ultimate form of comfort and relaxation. These hammocks are tightly woven with high quality colorfast cotton thread to prevent colors from running. A natural choice for a Caribbean experience. Includes a zippered carrying bag. The hammock bed is 79 x 55 inches, with a total length of 132 inches. Accommodates one adult. 250 pound capacity. Hanging hardware sold separately. Can be used with Vivere #UHS9 universal space-saving steel hammock stand or #EFHTS eco-friendly hammock tree straps (sold separately).
feature_bullets: The ultimate form of comfort and relaxation
Tightly woven with high quality colorfast cotton thread to prevent colors from running
Hammock bed is 79 x 55 inches, with a total length of 132 inches; 250 pound capacity
Can be used with Vivere #UHS9 universal space-saving steel hammock stand or hammock tree straps (sold separately)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars202 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
